Producer: John Hart, Eva Kolodner, Jeff Sharp, Christine Vachon
Production Co: Independent Film Channel, Hart-Sharp Entertainment, Killer Films
Synopsis: Young female-to-male transgender Brandon Teena leaves his hometown under threat when his ex-girlfriend's brother discovers that he's biologically female. Resettling in the small town of Falls City, Nebraska, Brandon falls for Lana, an aspiring singer, and begins to plan for their future together. But when her ex-convict friends, John and Tom, learn Brandon's secret, things change very quickly.
Title: Boys Don't Cry
